00013 
00014 const double gMaxZoom = 6000000,
00015              gMinZoom = 0.001;
00016 
00017 struct ViewInfo {
00018 
00019    // Current selection (in seconds)
00020 
00021    double sel0;
00022    double sel1;
00023 
00024    // Scroll info
00025 
00026    int vpos;                    // vertical scroll pos
00027 
00028    double h;                    // h pos in secs
00029    double screen;               // screen width in secs
00030    double total;                // total width in secs
00031    double zoom;                 // pixels per second
00032    double lastZoom;
00033 
00034    // Current horizontal scroll bar positions, in pixels
00035    wxInt64 sbarH;
00036    wxInt64 sbarScreen;
00037    wxInt64 sbarTotal;
00038    
00039    // Internal wxScrollbar positions are only int in range, so multiply
00040    // the above values with the following member to get the actual
00041    // scroll bar positions as reported by the horizontal wxScrollbar's members
00042    double sbarScale;
00043 
00044    // Vertical scroll step
00045    int scrollStep;
00046 
00047    // Other stuff, mainly states (true or false) related to autoscroll and
00048    // drawing the waveform. Maybe this should be put somewhere else?
00049 
00050    bool bRedrawWaveform;
00051    bool bUpdateTrackIndicator;
00052 
00053    bool bIsPlaying;
00054 };
00055 
00056 #endif
